title: How it will feel when Taric rework is finished
body: Title says it all, picture says it again

replies.body: I think this is my new wallpaper.
then make taric rework happen already >:)
I got Taric to level 5 just yesterday. I. AM. READY!

> [{quoted}](name=RiotScruffy,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=eu061sHF,comment-id=0014,timestamp=2015-07-01T17:27:59.679+0000)
>
> I think this is my new wallpaper.

Then I dare you to send a screen shot of you posting it up. xD 
The poster would love that
Hopefully the rework won't be totally... outragous
who's taric
The most fabulous champion in the League of Motherfucking Legends, you lowly piece of ~~summoner~~ player scum, how dare you insult his fabulous-ness.
they need to make an armor of the 5th age team.  draven should be the adc

It's all Taric, just different abilities. Even if the models stretch around from certain skills, I don't care. Taric/Draven will throw HAMMERS, and Taric/Anivia will shoot HAMMERS, and Yorick will summon HAMMERS, and...

I could go on forever.
Isn't he that guy who does stuff with Ezreal???? (Truly outrageous)
Now, he's much better with Kalista.
No, no you got it wrong. I mean STUFF
shh. Not in front of the children.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZZ5LpwO-An4

Ahhhhyaaaayaaayayaahhhhyaaayaaayaaayaya


I said hey

What's goin' on
Is that Heman with recolored hair? The I didn't think Taric could get any manlier but you sir have proven me wrong.
I could listen a Taric VO of this for over 9000 hours
Of the Heyyyeyayeyeahyeahyeah song? Yes please.
OuuutttrAaaeeAaeeeAaageous.
Can the next ultimate skin be Rainbow Gem Taric
No plz :( I no havs monny for nuu skien {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
plz make heman taric skin.
they already did a rework on taric after s3 i miss s3 taric and his mana scaling
u call a new passive a rework ? eh i wonder where you come from

At that point in time it was pretty much a rework. This year the definition of rework seems to be more then 1 ability, skill, passive etc. So Renga is valid Maegges. Opinions. (that and there is a difference between rework and full rework)
call it passive rework or ability rework be mor specific because a rework sounds like a complete overhaul and that wasnt done.

http://i.imgur.com/6b9Zcb1.gif"

Nice editing. :)


Yea that could be nice, Also it could be nice if riot "promised" to give us the mystery champ today 7/1. Thanks riot for remembering
Don't be so impatient. This is a global thing. They have to get to Asia first, because their timezone is first. Na can expect theirs sometime tonight.
I know KateyKhaos stated that they should all be given out by the end of 7/1, so there is still time for them to fulfill that promise.

Good bye: dazzling stun Taric

Hello: lusting gaze charm Taric

As long as I can still play Anti-AD Taric top.
I will be happy. They have killed my carry Tarics 3 times over...

Mage-Taric
Super-Mana-Slap Taric.
I can't lose him any moOOOOorRREeee!
is it a visual one or are they changing his powers also?
This is a full rework, they changed taric after s3 to balance him out, this one is a full VU and gameplay update
ok
It's RAINING GEMS! Hallelujah!

So like in 2017 then?

Nah, but for real, I can't wait, I really want to see an updated Taric, his model and theme has a lot of potential.

My gem body is ready.

(Insert Image of Reggie Fils-Amie with Taric armor here)
I heard they're working Taric pretty good.
Truly Truly Outrageous
This
Can naked Taric be the next skin? pleaaaaaase :P (put a leaf in the no no area :D)

As a Taric main, I approve.
